DOC.brief_summary: This observational study evaluate efficacy safety capecitabine combination oxaliplatin adjuvant setting participant Stage III colon cancer . Data collect participant 36 month disease recurrence .
DOC.brief_title: An Observational Study Adjuvant Treatment With Capecitabine ( Xeloda ) Combination With Oxaliplatin Participants With Stage III Colon Cancer
